sentences.en: A predominantly liquid diet for a day or two may be helpful.
sentences.cn: 一两天里主要吃流质食物可能会有好处。

sentences.en: Although it is predominantly a teenage problem, acne can occur in early childhood.
sentences.cn: 虽然粉刺多发于青少年时期，但也可能在刚进入童年时期就出现。

sentences.en: Both audience and player alike were predominantly Black for that gestation period.
sentences.cn: 在蓝调音乐的萌芽时期,黑人占了艺人与听众的绝对多数.

sentences.en: Cyclobutane exists predominantly in a " butterfly " conformation.
sentences.cn: 环丁烷主要成 “ 蝶式 ” 构象存在.

sentences.en: Endodeme is a deme composed of predominantly closely inbreeding but dioecious individuals.
sentences.cn: 同系同群种是由近亲繁育占优势,但雌雄异株的个体组成的同群种.

sentences.en: His audience consists predominantly of groups of rugby-club revellers.
sentences.cn: 他的观众主要是橄榄球俱乐部里那些纵酒作乐的人。

sentences.en: In old China, family heads were predominantly men.
sentences.cn: 旧中国, 绝大多数家庭由男人当家.

sentences.en: Inbreeders are plants which predominantly or wholly produce seeds from self - fertilization.
sentences.cn: 近交植物指主要地或完全地通过自在受精产生种子的植物.

sentences.en: PLEASE LEAVE QUIETLY AS THIS IS PREDOMINANTLY A RESIDENTIAL AREA.
sentences.cn: 本区域大部为居民区,请您离开时不要大声喧哗.

sentences.en: The city’s population is predominantly Irish.
sentences.cn: 该城市的人口绝大多数是爱尔兰人。

sentences.en: The deposit is contained in the predominantly calc - silicate upper part of the corella formation.
sentences.cn: 矿床位于科雷拉岩系上部主要为钙质-硅酸盐类的岩层中.

sentences.en: The landscape has remained predominantly rural in appearance.
sentences.cn: 这里的风景看上去还是以田园风光为主。

sentences.en: The mud was a blue - gray plastic clay composed predominantly of montmorillonite with some illite.
sentences.cn: 这种泥土是一种蓝青色胶质土,主要由蒙脱土和一些伊利土组成.
劳动力中男性占绝大多数.
浊度主要是由胶体物质造成的.

sentences.en: Under these conditions the state of stress is predominantly plane stress.
sentences.cn: 在这些条件下,应力状态是平面应力占优势.

words.tran_cn: 主要的；卓越的；支配的；有力的；有影响的
占主导（或支配）地位；占优势

trans.tran_cn: 占主导地位地，显著地，占优势地
trans.tran_en: You use predominantly to indicate which feature or quality is most noticeable in a situation
